sentences.english: Qingdao is a prime tourist  destination, with a beer  festival and a yacht culture.
sentences.chinese: 青岛是个旅游胜地，有著名的啤酒节和快艇文化。

sentences.english: The shapes Shemsen watched were wrong for surface ships or fliers .
sentences.chinese: 舍姆森看到的部队外形并非是水面舰或者快艇。

sentences.english: "Space yacht" Ikaros headed for Venus and beyond.
sentences.chinese: “太空快艇”埃喀里斯飞向金星和更远的宇宙。

sentences.english: This is the new Bugatti Veyron concept speedboat.
sentences.chinese: 这是布加迪威龙全新概念快艇。

sentences.english: Our fastest ship can catch up with the chase in two hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们的特别快艇两小时就能追赶上那只船。

sentences.english: They had just had enough time to swim out of danger when the boat again completed a circle.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚刚来得及游出危险区，快艇就又转完了一圈。

sentences.english: At late afternoon we got picked up by the Speedboat again to head back to Phuket Island.
sentences.chinese: 下午的晚些时候我们又一次乘快艇回到了普吉岛。

sentences.english: The sailing boat fell foul of a motor speedboat in mid-river.
sentences.chinese: 这艘帆船与一条摩托快艇在河中央相撞。

sentences.english: Sources in the army confirm that the boats will be deployed on the Pangong Tso.
sentences.chinese: 军方的消息已确认该批快艇将部署在班公湖。

sentences.english: They travelled on the lake by speedboat.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘快艇在湖上游荡。

sentences.english: Mesoproterozoic plan with 022-class submarines will be used speedboats.
sentences.chinese: 计划中元级潜艇将会配合022快艇使用。

sentences.english: Like being in a speedboat, only better.
sentences.chinese: 就象乘快艇，只是感觉更好。

sentences.english: Had they swum out of danger when the boat again completed a circle?
sentences.chinese: 当快艇又转了一圈后，他们游出了危险区吗？

sentences.english: He planned to cross the Pacific by yacht.
sentences.chinese: 他曾打算乘快艇横渡太平洋。

sentences.english: Are you able to communicate with thee-boat?
sentences.chinese: 你能和鱼雷快艇联络吗？
